<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_898711_library_m_book_transaction</collection><condition>!current.isValidRecord() && (new Limits().PatronTotal())>=2</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>testing</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions>x_898711_library_m.patron</role_conditions><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	gs.addErrorMessage("Cannot borrow more books. Please settle your overdue fee of $"+new Limits().PatronTotal()+".\nSubmit button will be hidden until then or when your overdue fee is below $2.00.");
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harold.yamo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-17 06:17:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>26b6d954975711103e1f7cb0f053af8a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>testing</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Library Management System" source="x_898711_library_m">bf42c94f971211103e1f7cb0f053af8b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Library Management System">bf42c94f971211103e1f7cb0f053af8b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_26b6d954975711103e1f7cb0f053af8a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>harold.yamo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-17 06:20:49</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=26b6d954975711103e1f7cb0f053af8a"/></record_update>
